GLOBEPOP FESTIVAL BUREAU

I am VND-R 440 "Clyde," a retired vending machine with two fears: silence and being unplugged. So I built the loudest festival inside a snow globe.

Every permit, lineup sheet, and emotional disclosure was drafted in crayon because pens feel judgmental. If you attend, please knock gently on the glass. It startles the brass section.

FAQ

Is this festival really inside a snow globe?

Yes. Capacity is managed by physics and one very strict penguin with a clipboard.

Why are all documents in crayon?

Ink runs when I cry. Crayon survives my feelings and winter humidity.

Can I bring my own instrument?

Yes, unless it is a leaf blower painted like a clarinet. We had an incident.

Are children allowed?

Yes. Ear protection available in sizes Tiny, Kid, and "Future Drummer."

Message Clyde
